explanation: [0-0] A person has their hands clasped behind their head, a screen is fixed to the metal structure above with fluorescent green tape, and the screen displays Spiderman. There are also white letters "Vs" with black borders above.

[0-5] Then, a man in grayish-purple clothing places a screen displaying Spiderman on a silver pipe, securing it with fluorescent green tape, and the white text "the prototype..." appears above. After securing it, the man lies on the sofa, holding his head in his hands and looking at the screen above, but the screen falls and hits him in the face.
